TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientFormsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity
Public Class ClientFormsIdentity Implements IDisposable, IIdentity
public ref class ClientFormsIdentity : IDisposable, System::Security::Principal::IIdentity
type ClientFormsIdentity = class interface IIdentity interface IDisposable

summary.span: 代表已使用表單驗證，經用戶端應用程式服務驗證的使用者識別。

span.span: Represents a user identity authenticated for client application services by using forms authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端應用程式服務功能會使用這個類別來代表已驗證的使用者。The client application services feature uses this class to represent an authenticated user. 當您設定應用程式以使用用戶端應用程式服務與表單驗證時，您還可以驗證使用者，藉由呼叫`static`方法。When you configure your application to use client application services and forms authentication, you can authenticate a user by calling the `static` method. 在驗證之後，您可以擷取目前的參考執行個體透過屬性透過擷取`static`屬性。After authentication, you can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the property of the retrieved through the `static` property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/client-application-services.md). 您通常會存取物件做為參考，以避免直接相依於此類別。You will typically access a object as an reference to avoid a direct dependency on this class. 您可以判斷使用者是否經過檢查身分識別的屬性。You can determine whether a user is authenticated by checking the property of the identity. 不過，Windows，但無法對用戶端應用程式服務，可能會驗證使用者。However, the user may be authenticated for Windows, but not for client application services. 若要判斷使用者是否已驗證的用戶端應用程式服務，您應該也確認屬性值是"ClientForms"。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, you should also confirm that the property value is "ClientForms". 您必須使用明確呼叫的參考方法，它不由定義介面。You must use an explicit reference to call the method, which is not defined by the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以無訊息方式重新驗證使用者，當應用程式離開 「 離線 」 狀態時使用這個類別。The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to silently revalidate a user when the application leaves the offline state. 在此範例中，事件處理常式更新離線的狀態，以符合核取方塊的值。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status to match the check box value. 如果使用者設定為線上狀態的應用程式，事件處理常式會嘗試重新驗證使用者，藉由呼叫方法。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user by calling the method. 不過，如果驗證伺服器無法使用時，事件處理常式會傳回應用程式為離線狀態。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. > [!NOTE] > 方法只是為了方便而使用。The method is for convenience only. 因為它沒有傳回值，所以無法表示重新驗證是否失敗。Because it does not have a return value, it cannot indicate whether revalidation has failed. 例如，如果在伺服器上的使用者認證已變更，重新驗證就可能會失敗。Revalidation can fail, for example, if the user credentials have changed on the server. 在這種情況下，您可能想要加入在服務呼叫失敗之後能夠明確驗證使用者的程式碼。In this case, you might want to include code that explicitly validates users after a service call fails. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 [存取 Web 設定] 區段[逐步解說： 使用用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see the Accessing Web Settings section in [Walkthrough: Using Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md). [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不適用於您的應用程式程式碼中使用。This property is not meant for use in your application code. 您不能有意義地修改透過這個屬性中，所擷取的 cookie，其中包含任何有用的資訊。You cannot meaningfully modify the cookies retrieved through this property, and they contain no useful information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會存取物件做為參考，以避免直接相依於此類別。You will typically access a object as an reference to avoid a direct dependency on this class. 您可以判斷使用者是否經過檢查身分識別的屬性。You can determine whether a user is authenticated by checking the property of the identity. 不過，Windows，但無法對用戶端應用程式服務，可能會驗證使用者。However, the user may be authenticated for Windows, but not for client application services. 若要判斷使用者是否已驗證的用戶端應用程式服務，您應該也確認屬性值是"ClientForms"。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, you should also confirm that the property value is "ClientForms". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，透過來判斷使用者是否目前已驗證的用戶端應用程式服務的參考。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property through an reference to determine whether a user is currently authenticated for client application services. 這個範例假設應用程式是在預設組態中的使用者不需要登入一次的驗證 cookie 過期時。This example assumes that the application is in the default configuration where users are not required to log in again when the authentication cookie expires. 否則，可能表示使用者登入已過期。Otherwise, the might indicate that the user login has expired. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱 [清除設定未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會存取物件做為參考，以避免直接相依於此類別。You will typically access a object as an reference to avoid a direct dependency on this class. 您可以判斷使用者是否經過檢查身分識別的屬性。You can determine whether a user is authenticated by checking the property of the identity. 不過，Windows，但無法對用戶端應用程式服務，可能會驗證使用者。However, the user may be authenticated for Windows, but not for client application services. 若要判斷使用者是否已驗證的用戶端應用程式服務，您應該也確認屬性值是"ClientForms"。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, you should also confirm that the property value is "ClientForms". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，透過來判斷使用者是否目前已驗證的用戶端應用程式服務的參考。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property through an reference to determine whether a user is currently authenticated for client application services. 這個範例假設應用程式是在預設組態中的使用者不需要登入一次的驗證 cookie 過期時。This example assumes that the application is in the default configuration where users are not required to log in again when the authentication cookie expires. 否則，可能表示使用者登入已過期。Otherwise, the might indicate that the user login has expired. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RevalidateUser() cil managed

summary.span: 使用快取的認證，以無訊息模式驗證使用者。

span.span: Silently authenticates the user by using cached credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用表單驗證來驗證目前的使用者，類別會儲存使用者認證，只要在執行應用程式。When you use forms authentication to validate the current user, the class stores the user credentials as long as the application is running. 不過，直到驗證 cookie 到期為止，是只驗證使用者。However, the user is only authenticated until the authentication cookie expires. 在 cookie 過期後，使用者必須重新驗證以存取遠端角色或 Web 設定服務。After the cookie expires, the user must be revalidated to access the remote roles or Web settings services. 您可以使用**服務的進階設定**對話方塊來設定您的應用程式會自動重新驗證使用者，如中所述[How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。You can use the **Advanced Settings for Services** dialog box to configure your application to automatically revalidate the user, as described in [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 不過，如果您設定您的應用程式，以接受 cookie 到期日時，您可以透過程式設計方式重新驗證使用者，藉由呼叫方法。However, if you configure your application to honor the cookie expiration, you can programmatically revalidate the user by calling the method. 這個方法也很有用時從離線模式切換到線上模式中，因為應用程式關閉時離線。This method is also useful when switching from offline mode to online mode, because the application may have been shut down while offline. > [!NOTE] > 方法只是為了方便而使用。The method is for convenience only. 因為它沒有傳回值，所以無法表示重新驗證是否失敗。Because it does not have a return value, it cannot indicate whether revalidation has failed. 例如，如果在伺服器上的使用者認證已變更，重新驗證就可能會失敗。Revalidation can fail, for example, if the user credentials have changed on the server. 在這種情況下，您可能想要加入在服務呼叫失敗之後能夠明確驗證使用者的程式碼。In this case, you might want to include code that explicitly validates users after a service call fails. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 [存取 Web 設定] 區段[逐步解說： 使用用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see the Accessing Web Settings section in [Walkthrough: Using Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/walkthrough-using-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以無訊息方式重新驗證使用者，當應用程式離開 「 離線 」 狀態時使用這個方法。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to silently revalidate a user when the application leaves the offline state. 在此範例中，事件處理常式更新離線的狀態，以符合核取方塊的值。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status to match the check box value. 如果使用者設定為線上狀態的應用程式，事件處理常式會嘗試重新驗證使用者。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 不過，如果驗證伺服器無法使用時，事件處理常式會傳回應用程式為離線狀態。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state.
